feature_disk_space.description: Optional disk space needed for cumulus_adt

docker_registry.description: Which docker registry to use: quay.io/cumulus (default) or cumulusprod

mkfastq_use_bases_mask.description: Override the read lengths as specified in RunInfo.xml

cellranger_version.description: cellranger/cellranger-atac/cellranger-arc mkfastq registry, default to gcr.io/broad-cumulus

crispr_barcode_pos.description: Barcode start position at Read 2 (0-based coordinate) for CRISPR

vdj_disk_space.description: Optional disk space needed for cell ranger vdj.

delete_input_bcl_directory.description: Whether to delete input_bcl_directory, default: false

scaffold_sequence.description: scaffold sequence for CRISPR, default is ""

max_mismatch.description: maximum hamming distance in feature barcodes (change default to 2)

arc_num_cpu.description: Number of cpus for cellranger-arc count

arc_min_gex_count.description: Cell caller override: define the minimum number of GEX UMI counts for a cell barcode.

vdj_chain.description: Force the analysis to be carried out for a particular chain type.

zones.description: Google cloud zones, default to "us-central1-a us-central1-b us-central1-c us-central1-f us-east1-b us-east1-c us-east1-d us-west1-a us-west1-b us-west1-c"

peaks.description: A BED file to override peak caller

num_cpu.description: Number of cpus per cellranger and spaceranger job

secondary.description: Perform secondary analysis of the gene-barcode matrix (dimensionality reduction, clustering and visualization). Default: false.

cumulus_feature_barcoding_version.description: cellranger/cellranger-atac/cellranger-arc mkfastq registry, default to gcr.io/broad-cumulus

cmo_set.description: CMO set CSV file, declaring CMO constructs and associated barcodes

mkfastq_barcode_mismatches.description: Number of allowed mismatches per index

count_disk_space.description: Optional disk space needed for cell ranger count.

atac_num_cpu.description: Number of cpus for cellranger-atac count

min_read_ratio.description: minimum read count ratio (non-inclusive) to justify a feature given a cell barcode and feature combination, only used for data type crispr

arc_disk_space.description: Optional disk space needed for cellranger-arc count

awsQueueArn.description: Arn string of AWS queue to use

mkfastq_filter_single_index.description: Only demultiplex samples identified by an i7-only sample index, ignoring dual-indexed samples.  Dual-indexed samples will not be demultiplexed.

atac_dim_reduce.description: For atac, choose the algorithm for dimensionality reduction prior to clustering and tsne: 'lsa' (default), 'plsa', or 'pca'.

force_cells.description: Force pipeline to use this number of cells, bypassing the cell detection algorithm, mutually exclusive with expect_cells.

mkfastq_delete_undetermined.description: Delete undetermined FASTQ files generated by bcl2fastq2

arc_min_atac_count.description: Cell caller override: define the minimum number of ATAC transposition events in peaks (ATAC counts) for a cell barcode.

atac_disk_space.description: Optional disk space needed for cellranger-atac count

no_bam.description: If generate bam outputs. This is also a spaceranger argument.

cellranger_atac_version.description: cellranger/cellranger-atac/cellranger-arc mkfastq registry, default to gcr.io/broad-cumulus

include_introns.description: If count reads mapping to intronic regions

mkfastq_force_single_index.description: If 10x-supplied i7/i5 paired indices are specified, but the flowcell was run with only one sample index, allow the demultiplex to proceed using the i7 half of the sample index pair.

vdj_denovo.description: Do not align reads to reference V(D)J sequences before de novo assembly. Default: false

mkfastq_docker_registry.description: cellranger/cellranger-atac/cellranger-arc mkfastq registry, default to gcr.io/broad-cumulus

expect_cells.description: Expected number of recovered cells. Mutually exclusive with force_cells

cellranger_arc_version.description: cellranger/cellranger-atac/cellranger-arc mkfastq registry, default to gcr.io/broad-cumulus

multi_disk_space.description: Optional disk space needed for cell ranger multi.
